jd: From: Chakri Busi, Unify Solutions Inc chakrib@unifysolutions.com Reply to: chakrib@unifysolutions.com Job Title: Azure Data Architect(ETL background must )Location: RemoteDuration: Long-term opportunity MUST HAVE:* Azure Data Factory - Data flow* Azure Notebooks, Data bricks, * NoSQL (MongoDB/Cosmos D)* Power BIFunctional Responsibilities:· Must have at least 10 + years. Of Exp. in Designing & Architecting the Data Applications on Premises & Cloud.· Azure Data Architect with having solid understanding of design Principles of Database Architecture and business strategies using Azure Cloud Data Ecosystem.· Maintain the governance model on the database architecture through training, design reviews, code reviews, and progress reviews.· Participate in the development of Database Architecture and Roadmaps in support of business strategies· Determine how the enterprise’s data will be stored and utilized to best provide actionable data to the end user· Work with internal and external resources to develop robust Extract/Transform/Load (ETL) processes for disparate data sources. Thanks & Regards,Chakri,chakrib@unifysolutions.com,Unify Solutions Inc.
